pages.text: Maybe it's time to look into how to make something basic. First I need to look for some resources that can be used in nature, such as $(item)Sticks/$, $(item)Small Stones/$, and $(item)Plant Fiber/$, the former two can be found everywhere on the ground, and $(item)Plant Fiber/$ requires me to pull grass out of the ground.

I can't deal with wood empty-handed, because I'm not a karate master, and I need tools to get wood. $(br)  I can also make some very rough armor, although they are very fragile, but it is better than nothing, it is not a big deal to wear two pieces together. $(br)  Now I can cut down those trees, but such large logs are not good to use, maybe they should be processed into smaller forms? $(br)

pages.title: Resource recycling
pages.text: Make a Rough Mallet and /$§3Sneak + Right-Click/$ on $(item)Any Log/$ to craft a $(item)Craftsmanship Table/$.$(br)  The Craftsmanship Table can be used to recycle or disassemble many kinds of garbage, machines, and can also be used to create some special tools.

pages.title: Original carpentry
pages.text: Both Wooden Boards and Sticks can be made by crafting from the Craftsmanship Table. Before making a more advanced production table, I first need to determine its framework.

$(br)  $(l:start/C02tooltoblock)$(m)$(7)These frameworks are extremely fragile, weak, and can break at any time, so I need to build blocks as soon as possible and try to use them as soon as possible.$(/l)
Use two Sticks and a piece of Paper (or one piece of Cloth or Fabric/two sheets of Paper Waste) to synthesize Parchment.

pages.title: Idea Table
pages.text: I need to use it for more complex research.$(br2)  In order to make the Crafting Table, I also need to find some Scrap Iron, which may be found in the Garbage on the road.

pages.title: Crafting Table
pages.text: To make a Crafting Table, I need the following items:$(li)A piece of iron for processing items$(li)A board for making the shell$(li)A frame $(br) Put them together with a piece of parchment paper and a feather into the Idea Table, and you can figure out how to make the Crafting Table.$(br) $(br2) $(br2)$(t:[Scrap Iron] [Wood Board] [Block Of Sticks])$(#343434)  [?]$(/t)

pages.title: Crafting Table
pages.text: This step has no effect until the previous step is completed.

pages.title: Recyclabe Scaffolding
pages.text: Crafting Table, is there anything more exciting than that? I can finally use it to prove that I am not from the barbarian era. However, I also needed a more stable way to obtain planks so that I could build a shelter.

pages.title: Wooden Frame
pages.text: For now, it's definitely not cheap...$(br)  You need to bring six Wood Boards in your Inventory, and then add Wood Boards by /$§3right-click/$ the Wooden Frame with a Rough Stone Axe. Finally, use a Rough Stone Axe to dig down the planks that

have been built. It was placed in the Idea Table along with a Wood Board and a Wooden Frame for research. $(br) If nothing else, I was able to break down the planks with my bare hands after the research was done.

pages.title: Campfire
pages.text: I need light, heat, clean water and food. A campfire in the wilderness is essential to meet all four of the requirements I need.$(br)  To make a campfire, I need the following items:$(li)A piece of fuel with higher calories$(li)Some base as auxiliary fuel$(li)Some support$(br)  Put them together with a piece of parchment and a feather into the Idea Table and you can figure out how to make the Campfire.$(br)$(t:[Coal] [Wood Board] [Stick])$(#343434)[?]$(/t)

pages.title: Prometheus
pages.text: I can use it to simply cook some food and make torches, and it's not yet hot enough for me to start the industrial process.
